summary: A young female orsimer looking for fame and glory! Can you help her?
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://www.abload.de/img/nameqxacv.gif[/img]

A young female orsimer looking for fame and glory! Can you help her?

TO INSTALL: Just drop the file into your saves folder. This should be located at C:\\Users\\YOURUSERNAME\\Documents\\My Games\\Skyrim\\Saves.
TO CHANGE HER NAME: Hit the tilde (`) to bring up the console, type showracemenu and then press enter. Close the console with the tilde again to edit. 

MODS: Because I use many mods so not sure which do the desired effect. Here\'s a little list. I suggest first to test the Save File with your mods and decide then to add some of them.

[url=\"http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4307http://\"]AOF Believable Hair -Female and Male-[/url]
[url=\"http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6953http://\"]BFG - Better FaceGen[/url]
[url=\"http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3563http://\"]Coverwomen - Look 4[/url]
[url=\"http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/627http://\"]Eyebrows Match Hair[/url]
[url=\"http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/5106http://\"]Female face retexture[/url]
[url=\"http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30\"]No More Blocky Faces[/url]
[url=\"http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4333http://\"]Straight hair retexture[/url]
[url=\"http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2356http://\"]XCE - Xenius Character Enhancement [/url][/center]
author: GENS0
